title: Contributing to templateRpackage
text: Use clear, descriptive title. Provide detailed steps reproduce implement. Fill PR template. Include tests documentation. Improve documentation submitting PRs clarifications additions.

title: Contributing to templateRpackage
text: Use 2 spaces indentation. Use box imports. Prefer base R functions avoid unnecessary dependencies. aim minimise external dependencies, including tidyverse packages. Write clear, efficient, maintainable code.

title: Contributing to templateRpackage
text: Use present tense (“Add feature”, “Added feature”) concise descriptive

title: Contributing to templateRpackage
text: Post discussions tab. Thank contributing templateRpackage!

title: Demonstrating templateRpackage
text: vignette demonstrates two main functions templateRpackage: add() - simple R function add two numbers sum_array_cpp() - Rcpp function sum numeric vector using loop unrolling

title: Demonstrating templateRpackage
text: add() function simple R function adds two numbers:

title: Demonstrating templateRpackage
text: sum_array_cpp() function sums numeric vector using C++ loop unrolling performance:
code: sum_array_cpp(1:10) #> [1] 55 sum_array_cpp(c(1.5, 2.5, 3.5)) #> [1] 7.5  # Works with larger vectors x <- rnorm(1000) sum_array_cpp(x) #> [1] 4.339615

title: Demonstrating templateRpackage
text: Let’s compare performance sum_array_cpp() base R’s sum():
code: box::use(microbenchmark[ microbenchmark ]) box::use(ggplot2[ autoplot, labs, theme_minimal ])  # Create test vectors of different sizes set.seed(42) small <- rnorm(1e3) medium <- rnorm(1e5) large <- rnorm(1e6)  # Benchmark with a large vector mb <- microbenchmark(   "Base R sum()" = sum(large),   "Rcpp sum_array_cpp()" = sum_array_cpp(large),   times = 100 )  print(mb) #> Unit: microseconds #>                  expr      min       lq      mean    median        uq      max #>          Base R sum() 1860.930 1870.358 1874.9436 1872.7570 1878.0915 1904.712 #>  Rcpp sum_array_cpp()  930.174  939.106  944.0822  941.0095  948.4685  993.563 #>  neval #>    100 #>    100 autoplot(mb) +   labs(     title = "Performance Comparison: Base R vs Rcpp",     subtitle = "Summing 1 million random numbers (100 iterations)"   ) +   theme_minimal()

title: Authors and Citation
text: Mezquita, D. (2026). templateRpackage: Template R Package Rcpp Support. R package version 0.0.0.9000. Available https://github.com/derecksprojects/templateRpackage
